title: Charmander is a lizard with a fire tail that grows into a bigger fire tail lizard.
body:
And then into a goddamn dragon.

Squirtle is a turtle that evolves into a turtle with a fancy tail.
Which turns into a turtle with fucking hydraulic cannons.

Bulbasaur is a frog with a plant on its back which evolves into a frog with a plant on its back, which in turn evolves into a frog with a plant on its back.

Can anyone remind me why anyone would ever choose Bulbasaur?
